ISSUE.TITLE: ret_code type in plugin redirect document is dubious
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve Docs ## Please describe which part of docs should be improved or typo fixed The type of `ret_type` in attribution descriptions is `string`. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10428333/112810253-6a2ce080-90ad-11eb-9f72-18a6a607d32b.png) But when test cases are shown, the type is `integer`. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10428333/112810326-7b75ed00-90ad-11eb-87dc-a95f495533cd.png) From the plugin schema definition, it's really an integer. ## Describe the solution you'd like Type in attributions should be changed to `integer`.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: docs: ret_code type in plugin redirect should be integer (#3932)
